Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Beckman Coulter AU480 automated clinical analyzer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for LZI Cotinine II Enzyme Immunoassay for qualitative and semi-quantitative detection of cotinine in human urine using automated clinical chemistry analyzers.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for qualitative and semi-quantitative determination of cotinine in human urine as an aid in detecting use or exposure to tobacco products; designed for prescription use with automated clinical chemistry analyzers.
